ev_data <- read.csv("Electric_Vehicle_Population_Data.csv")

#Quantitative Variable
summary(ev_data$Model.Year)
summary(ev_data$Electric.Range)


#Categorical Variables
table(ev_data$Make)[1:10]
table(ev_data$Model)[1:10]


#Transform the variable
ev_data$Age <- 2025 - ev_data$Model.Year
summary(ev_data$Age)


#Histogram to show quantitative variable
hist(ev_data$Electric.Range,
     main = "Distribution of Electric Range",
     xlab = "Electric Range (miles)",
     col = "skyblue", border = "white")



#Scatterplot
plot(ev_data$Model.Year, ev_data$Electric.Range,
     main = "Model Year vs. Electric Range",
     xlab = "Model Year", ylab = "Electric Range",
     pch = 19, col = "darkgreen")
